Text:
Thanks a bunch!! :-)

I'm just wondering: Could you possibly make a separate upload of part 2 in the 12-part "groundwork"-series, the missing chapter in this torrent:

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6260760/Horse_Training__C._Anderson_s_Groundwork

If so, It'd be simply great! It's just too bad that it's missing.. :-/

Anyway: Thanks for helping horses and owners/riders to a better life.. ;-)
I am sorry I cannot; the source was too damaged to copy.
